resources.string: You must write at least two letters to search!
Text to Speech voice is not available for chosen locale.\nTry to set another language in Settings.\nYou can also install a TTS engine with an French voice language.

Text to Speech voice is not available for Romanian language.\nTry to update the Google Text-to-speech engine in Google Play Store.\nStarting January 2018, Google included a Romanian voice in their free speech synthesizer.
View the application in Play Store
Are you sure you want to reset it?\nThe programm will be in its initial state.\nIf you bought the Premium version, this will be re-activated after a new launch of the application.
Shake to initiate a new search
Start searching when the lower right corner button of the virtual keyboards is pressed
Enable full text search (this will display only whole words, delimited by non-alphanumeric characters)
Choose the size of the results text:
The 1.0 version was released on Wednesday, 10 February 2016
Last update was released on Sunday, August 12th, 2018
Icon and images created by Iulian Duma and Ștefan Halus
Beta testing: Iulian Duma and Ioto Hăinală

string-array.name: information_array
string-array.item: French Romanian Dictionary is very simple, easy to use and comprehensive.
It contains thousands of words.
Allows translation from French to Romanian and from Romanian to French.
The database is stored in your phone or tablet, no internet connection is needed (there is an offline database).
To search a term, fill in the edit field found in the upper part of the main window and tap the search button.
The results will appear in a list of maximum 300 items.
To change the search direction, tap the Switch languages button found above the edit field.
Tapping the results, the French fragments are read by a voice found in your phone to hear their pronunciation.
Tapping long the results, a context menu appears.
In this context menu you can choose to add a result into vocabulary, hear the French part pronounced by a voice, to hear the word spelled by the same voice, to copy the result into clipboard.

There are many options which can be enabled or disabled in settings: change search mode, all occurrences or full words only, keep screen awake, play sounds or not for some events, shake device for a new search, choose text size.

There is also a possibility to change the background of all screens. By default a random background is chosen at first launch of the dictionary. The background can be also disabled. All these settings can be found in Settings, Choose background.

In Voice settings (TTS) it\'s possible to change the preferred voice for pronouncing French parts of the results. All synthesizer engines available are shown, for each of them appearing the French voice variants. There is also possible to change the speed and pitch of the voice.
My vocabulary module is a tool which allows to add words sorted into sections in a separate database.
Tap long a result and choose in the context menu Add to My vocabulary.\nAn alert to choose an existing section or to create a new one where to add the result appears.
In the My vocabulary window it is possible to view records by sections, to delete them and other actions.\nThis way it is possible to learn easily new French words.
Any section can be exported in a file with .frd extension on the external storage.\nTo import a section from file, just open it using a file manager.
There are also predefined sections like Animals, Colors which can be imported.\nThese predefined sections can be found in the menu of My vocabulary module.
In the Standard version, in the bottom part of the main windows of the application some Google ads appear.
There is a Premium version which removes the ads, this way the application works better.
Go in main menu of the dictionary and choose Premium version to make the purchase. Paying a small among, the Premium version will be available forever, even after a re-installation of the dictionary.
The paid version is available for all devices signed-in with the same Google account.
For other questions or to make suggestions, please write to emanuelboboiu@gmail.com.

resources.string: We know %1$s irregular verbs.\nYou can learn them reading the alphabetical list, or you can choose our quizzes.
Choose an initial to show verbs
Choose the forms to fill in:
The %1$s form is missing. Tap here to fill in it.

string-array.name: verb_forms_array
string-array.item: Nothing
1st
2nd
3rd

resources.string: You must choose at least one form to fill in.\nCheck the forms you want to fill in and tap again the Start button.
Choose one, two or three forms to fill in, after tap the Start button.\nThe items will appear here one by one.
Congratulations! You were perfect, no mistakes found.\n
Item %1$s, the %2$s form of the verb %3$s:\ncorrect – %4$s, you wrote %5$s.
The general average will appear here.
The average for last %1$s marks is %2$s
The average for last %1$s marks will appear here
A list containing the last %1$s marks will appear here.
View online score boards and statistics
Your current nickname is %1$s.\nFill in your new nickname. It will appear in online statistics:
Tap here to write you nickname…
Your nickname must contain at least two letters.\nPlease write again.
The change was finished successfully!\nYour new nickname is %1$s.\nThis will appear in online statistics and score boards.
We detect there is no a connection available.\n Please connect your device to the Internet and try again.

To avoid an excessive resources request of the device, only %1$s results were displayed.\nYou can try a more specific search or you can enable full text words searching in General Settings to narrow the results.

If you don\'t want the ads to appear anymore, you can make a payment of only %1$s.\nYou will have the Premium Version of the dictionary, the app will not connect to the internet to query the ads, data packets won\'t be consumed anymore for that.
You already have the Premium Version, thanks for your interest in this dictionary.

Congratulations!
You have purchased successfully the Premium Version of the French Romanian Dictionary.
The ads won't appear anymore.
Thanks for your interest in this dictionary.
Copy only the term into clipboard
Copy only the explanation into clipboard
You didn\'t choose a vocabulary section for selected result.\nPlease try again!.
This word and explanation already exists in the vocabulary.\nYou cannot add the same word twice.
You filled in a vocabulary section name that already exists.\nThe selected result was inserted into the existing section.

Your vocabulary contains:
 - sections: %1$s,
 - records: %2$s,
 - records per section: %3$s.
You didn\'t add any word to your vocabularyes.\nTo add a word, tap long a result in Dictionary window.
Are you sure you want to delete %1$s from your vocabulary?
The section %1$s has been deleted.\nIt wasn\'t containing records anymore.
Are you sure you want to delete all the sections and records in your vocabulary?\nThis cannot be undone.
Are you sure you want to delete the section %1$s and all its records?\nThis cannot be undone.
Do you also want to delete all the records in your vocabulary?\nThis will take effect at the next launch of the dictionary.
Both edit fields must contain text.\nPlease try again!
Fill in the edit fields below to add a new record in %1$s:
The %1$s section will be exported into %2$s file.\nThis file will be created in the folder named %3$s, found on the external storage.
The section %1$s was exported successfully.\nNumber of records: %2$s.
The export process didn\'t succeed.\nBe sure the necessar permission was granted to this application.
The file could not be found or opened.\nBe sure the necessar permission was granted to this application.

Import into %1$s section finished:
- records added: %2$s;
- duplicates ignored: %3$s.
An unknown error has occurred while importing…
If you find this dictionary useful, please rate it in Google Play.

This dictionary works well without any permisions granted.
We need that permission only to know your Google Id, this way more actions are available in this app.
We don't show anywhere publicly your Google Id.
Next time you can choose not to be asked anymore about this permission.
You can also give manually the permission in Application Manager, if your needs gets changed in future.

We don't know your Google Id, this way we cannot post on the server your results obtained solving quizzes.
Sometime ago you didn't accepted to give us the permission to read your Google account name.
If you want to view in future your results and other personal information, please go in Application Manager, this App, and turn on requested permissions.
We don't show publicly your Google Id.
You can also solve quizzes without turning on the necessary permission for reading Google account name.

It is impossible to export or import a section if we haven't the permission granted.
If you want to export or import sections in this vocabulary, try again and give the permission to this app to read and write external storage.
The dictionary continues to work well even you don't accept this in future.
You can also give manually the permission in Application Manager, if your needs gets changed in future.

You have chosen not to give the permission to write or read external storage to this dictionary app, we cannot do what you wanted.\nIf you want to do this action, please go in Application Manager, this App, and turn on requested permissions.

We noticed you are a loyal user of this dictionary.
Did you know about the possibility to buy a premium version just for %1$s?
If you are interested, go in main menu of the dictionary, Premium version.
With premium version you will enjoy this app without ads in the bottom part of the main windows.
This message will not appear anymore, it was just a notice for you, the dictionary continues to work well even you keep the standard version.
A list of TTS engines will appear here…
